Module info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev

Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello

package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello
Solution for hello-udp homework. Contains a client and a server to serves UDP connections.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill
  • Class
    Description
    HelloUDPClient
    Client that uses UDP protocol to send datagrams to a server and to print received data.
    HelloUDPServer
    Server that uses UDP protocol to receive packets and to send them with the prefix.
    Logger
    Logger that should be used to log info/errors.
    StandardOutputLogger
    Logger that print all the data to standard output.
